com.badlogic.gdx.graphics
Class TextureAtlas

java.lang.Object
  com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.TextureAtlas

public class TextureAtlas
extends java.lang.Object

A TextureAtlas is composed of a single Texture and named TextureRegions. You can add new regions at any time.

Author:
mzechner

Constructor Summary
TextureAtlas(Texture texture)
          Constructs a new texture atlas with the given texture.
 
Method Summary
 void addRegion(java.lang.String regionName, int x, int y, int width, int height)
          Adds a new TextureRegion with name regionName to this atlas.

          Adds the TextureRegion with name regionName to this atlas.
 TextureRegion getRegion(java.lang.String regionName)
          Returns the TextureRegion with name regionName or null in case the region is undefined.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

TextureAtlas

public TextureAtlas(Texture texture)
Constructs a new texture atlas with the given texture. Use addRegion(String, TextureRegion) or addRegion(String, int, int, int, int) to add TextureRegions

Parameters:
texture - the texture
Method Detail

getRegion

public TextureRegion getRegion(java.lang.String regionName)
Returns the TextureRegion with name regionName or null in case the region is undefined.

Parameters:
regionName - the region name
Returns:
the region or null.

addRegion

public void addRegion(java.lang.String regionName,
                      TextureRegion region)
Adds the TextureRegion with name regionName to this atlas. If a region with the given name was present already it will be overwritten.

Parameters:
regionName - the region name
region - the region

addRegion

public void addRegion(java.lang.String regionName,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int width,
                      int height)
Adds a new TextureRegion with name regionName to this atlas. If a region with the given name was already present it is overwritten.

Parameters:
regionName - the region name
x - the x coordinate of the region in pixels
y - the y coordinate of the region in pixels
width - the width of the region in pixels
height - the height of the region in pixels

getTexture

public Texture getTexture()
Returns:
the Texture of this atlas
